channel.title: [562] Huge request for help
channel.description:
I am wanting to make it so that the Player.java file make certain ints (i've got that part done) but I need to know how to add strings also.
Now I also need it so players (and staff) can type in commands to edit those ints and strings and get it saved to their account.
The last thing I need is a command similar to a MUCK, lookat command where you look at the player typing ::lookat player to see their details (ints and strings)
This is so a player can set their own description and the other players can view it
Anyone have any ideas
